lines.text: [after discovering that the Martians read minds and then blab your innermost secrets to your friends and neighbors]
It was like being invaded by people in your fourth-grade ethics textbook.
I think what they want is for everybody to be really honest, and say what they feel.
God, I hate people like that.
A meatloaf in the shape of a tree is surprisingly festive.
Invaders can be dealt with - these guys are tourists.
